body:
OPISNAVX is looking for an exceptional data scientist to synthesize and leverage our massive data set, to enhance the information we produce and create superior products.

This is a unique opportunity to join a multidisciplinary team of creative and passionate individuals, and create products and services that will be used by the Connected Car industry.

We are focused on high-impact projects utilizing big data analytics and machine learning to improve our Fuel Prices, Parking Information and Electric Vehicle products database.

We are a lean and flat team, working in quick iterations, using the techniques and algorithms best suited for solving the challenging problems of having very high quality and predictable data.


MAIN TASKS

    * Understand the business concepts underlying our massive data set
    * Translate business problems into a mathematical/statistics problems
    * Create and develop new algorithms and tools to model and analyze the data and build filtering and predictive models
    * Identify the most critical data, and provide strategic guidance to the rest of the company


PROFILE

    * Ph.D. or Masterâ€™s Degree in operations research, applied statistics, data mining, machine learning, or a related quantitative discipline. 
    * Deep understanding of statistical and predictive modeling concepts, machine-learning approaches, clustering and classification techniques, and recommendation and optimization algorithms.
    * A first experience in the field of complex analytical problems using quantitative approaches with statistics, mathematics and software skills.
    * Accomplished in the use of statistical analysis environments such as R, MATLAB, SPSS or SAS. 
Comfortable with relational databases, Hadoop-based data mining frameworks, Spark or Cassandra.
    * Familiar with SQL and Python.
title: DATA SCIENTIST
